channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Harris tells her story on historic night. And who else showed up on DNC's final night
item.description: Kamala Harris had a historic night on DNC's final night with her acceptance speech. Here are some key takeaways from this convention week. And, a look at why Democrats are thrilled.
item.content:encoded:
Kamala Harris had a historic night on DNC's final night with her acceptance speech. Here are some key takeaways from this convention week. And, a look at why Democrats are thrilled.

(Image credit: Grace Widyatmadja)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Indigenous and Black people tell their own stories at the Mystic Seaport Museum
item.description: Indigenous and Black people tell their own seafaring stories at Mystique Seaport Museum
item.content:encoded:
Indigenous and Black people tell their own seafaring stories at Mystique Seaport Museum

(Image credit: Ryan Caron King)
item.dc:creator: Diane Orson

item.title: The giant of fast fashion Shein is suing its ultracheap rival Temu
item.description: The two discount retailers have been battling it out in court for months, accusing each other of intimidation, theft and fraud. Both ship much of their items directly from China
item.content:encoded: The two discount retailers have been battling it out in court for months, accusing each other of intimidation, theft and fraud. Both ship much of their items directly from China
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh

item.title: With Kamala Harris leading in the polls, can Donald Trump come back?
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Republican pollster John McLaughlin about how former President Donald Trump can win back the White House in November.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Republican pollster John McLaughlin about how former President Donald Trump can win back the White House in November.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: In accepting the presidential nomination, Harris promised to put country first
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris gave the biggest speech of her political career Thursday night to cap off the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
item.content:encoded: Vice President Kamala Harris gave the biggest speech of her political career Thursday night to cap off the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Canada orders a third party to mediate a labor dispute between railways and employees
item.description: Negotiations between Canadian National Railway, Canadian Pacific Kansas City and the Teamsters union, which represents 10,000 of the companies' employees, began about a year ago.
item.content:encoded:
Negotiations between Canadian National Railway, Canadian Pacific Kansas City and the Teamsters union, which represents 10,000 of the companies' employees, began about a year ago.

(Image credit: Stephen Smith)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie

item.title: 5 takeaways from Kamala Harris’ historic acceptance speech
item.description: Harris isn't someone known for delivering big speeches, and the public’s views of her are still forming. She got the nomination, after all, without running in a primary.
item.content:encoded:
Harris isn't someone known for delivering big speeches, and the public’s views of her are still forming. She got the nomination, after all, without running in a primary.

(Image credit: Robyn Beck)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: A lithium mine in Serbia could rev up Europe's e-vehicles, but opposition is fierce
item.description: A proposed lithium mine in Serbia is spurring protests over its potential impact on the environment. The mineral is in high demand because it’s crucial for the batteries that run electric vehicles.
item.content:encoded:
A proposed lithium mine in Serbia is spurring protests over its potential impact on the environment. The mineral is in high demand because it’s crucial for the batteries that run electric vehicles.

(Image credit: Darko Vojinovic)
item.dc:creator: Rob Schmitz

item.title: A needle-less alternative to EpiPen has FDA approval. Will doctors prescribe it?
item.description: A nose spray version of the drug epinephrine will soon hit the market, giving people having allergic reactions an alternative to needles. But some allergists are not in a hurry to prescribe it.
item.content:encoded:
A nose spray version of the drug epinephrine will soon hit the market, giving people having allergic reactions an alternative to needles. But some allergists are not in a hurry to prescribe it.

(Image credit: Daisy-Daisy)
item.dc:creator: Suz Redfearn

item.title: What surprise DNC speaker did Trump once say was his VP pick? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week was the Democratic National Convention, which went full-on Met Gala and/or Olympics. If you watched that (and the Republican counterprogramming), you'll get at least five questions right.
item.content:encoded: This week was the Democratic National Convention, which went full-on Met Gala and/or Olympics. If you watched that (and the Republican counterprogramming), you'll get at least five questions right.
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris
